task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the subtraction feature of the JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what subtraction is.

result.p: The result from the subtraction function is displayed.

example.p: You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like: 3-2=1. You enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 1 appears on the screen.
